result.eng: It's a pitty something like that doesn't exist in Dublin.
result.ga: Is trua nach bhfuil a leithéid i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Is trua nach bhfuil a leithéid i mBaile Átha Cliath

result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ ḃfuil a leiṫéid i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫIt's a pitty something like that doesn't exist in Dublin.

result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.
result.ga: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.orig: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.html: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.
result.ponchtml: Tá trua agam don ḃean ḃoċt a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.

result.html: Is mór an trua sinThat's a shame.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an trua sinThat's a shame.

result.eng: I regret very much that I never saw the play.
result.ga: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamh
result.orig: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamh
result.html: Is mór an trua dom nach bhfaca mé an dráma riamhI regret very much that I never saw the play.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an trua dom naċ ḃfaca mé an dráma riaṁI regret very much that I never saw the play.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.orig: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.html: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do Ṁiċeál Duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.orig: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti

result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ aige dóiḃ aċ truaiġ gan tarrṫáil a ḃí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
